tests.name: Histogram (1)
tests.run: ./server -r 8080 >/dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 1; N=1000; P=5; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8080 -n ${N} -p ${P} -w 100 -h 20 -b 5 >out.tst 2>/dev/null; kill $! 2>/dev/null; KILLSTAT=$(echo $?); wait $! 2>/dev/null; WAITSTAT=$(echo $?); [ ${KILLSTAT} -eq 0 ] && [ ${WAITSTAT} -eq 143 ] && [ $(comm -12 out.tst test-files/data1.txt | wc -l) -eq $(cat test-files/data1.txt | wc -l) ]

tests.name: Histogram (2)
tests.run: ./server -r 8081 >/dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 1; N=10000; P=10; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8081 -n ${N} -p ${P} -w 100 -h 20 -b 30 >out.tst 2>/dev/null; kill $! 2>/dev/null; KILLSTAT=$(echo $?); wait $! 2>/dev/null; WAITSTAT=$(echo $?); [ ${KILLSTAT} -eq 0 ] && [ ${WAITSTAT} -eq 143 ] && [ $(comm -12 out.tst test-files/data2.txt | wc -l) -eq $(cat test-files/data2.txt | wc -l) ]

tests.name: CSV File Transfer
tests.run: ./server -r 8082 >/dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 1; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8082 -w 100 -b 30 -f 1.csv >/dev/null 2>&1; kill $! 2>/dev/null; KILLSTAT=$(echo $?); wait $! 2>/dev/null; WAITSTAT=$(echo $?); [ ${KILLSTAT} -eq 0 ] && [ ${WAITSTAT} -eq 143 ] && diff BIMDC/1.csv received/1.csv >/dev/null 2>&1

tests.name: Binary File Transfer
tests.run: ./server -r 8083 >/dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 1; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8083 -w 100 -b 50 -f test.bin >/dev/null 2>&1; kill $! 2>/dev/null; KILLSTAT=$(echo $?); wait $! 2>/dev/null; WAITSTAT=$(echo $?); [ ${KILLSTAT} -eq 0 ] && [ ${WAITSTAT} -eq 143 ] && diff BIMDC/test.bin received/test.bin >/dev/null 2>&1

tests.name: Binary File Transfer - Large Message Capacity
tests.run: ./server -r 8084 -m 4096 >/dev/null 2>&1 & sleep 1; ./client -a 127.0.0.1 -r 8084 -w 100 -b 50 -m 4096 -f test.bin >/dev/null 2>&1; kill $! 2>/dev/null; KILLSTAT=$(echo $?); wait $! 2>/dev/null; WAITSTAT=$(echo $?); [ ${KILLSTAT} -eq 0 ] && [ ${WAITSTAT} -eq 143 ] && diff BIMDC/test.bin received/test.bin >/dev/null 2>&1
